author: bouchamaouihichem
body:
#### PR description:


  - JC30DC can now be used with the ProcModifier DeepCoreSeeding and is ready for validation.
  - Latest Track POG update 11/20: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1345175/contributions/5662814/attachments/2754969/4796681/DeepCore_TrackPOG_23_1120.pdf
  - Last merged PR and relevant material: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42851

#### PR validation:

Validation on workflow 11923 (high pT QCD PU) for Tracking performance and 11834 (inclusive TTBAR PU) for timing performance.
title: Enabling the JetCore+DeepCore2.2.1 hybrid with MaxCand=30 (JC30DC)
